data.title: Estancia Bella Vista de Guerrero
data.meta_description: You are looking for a hotel in Buenos Aires, Argentina ? Authentic Hotels & Cruises recommends Estancia Bella Vista de Guerrero
data.text:
The impressive frame of the Pampas and the waved silhouette of the Salado`s river surround to this old 'Estancia' of the XIX century.

Its evolution ties to a traditional family with a romantic and dramatic history. And to a period of total influence of the European styles.

Bella Vista has the conjunction of valuables attributes: its constructions, the park, an intangible mount of 50 hectares with typical species of the Pampas and an attractive fauna (like the red deer's axis), fishing at the river and the farming production.

Its traditional style offers the guest, a warm sensation to be like in its house, as much in the privacy of the rooms like in the common spaces: living room with chimney, lobby bar, reading room and dining room with its surrounding galleries.

The 'Estancia' also counts with a Convention Centre for social and company's events with capacity for 90 people, totally equipped

What we like :

The charming atmosphere and feeling at home, the gorgeous views on the river and the park, the fusion of international and regional cuisine with Bella Vista-grown produce.
